name: Corrupted Ushabti
description: The Corrupted Ushabti is a Medium-sized undead creature that embodies the essence of neutral evil, appearing as a spirit inhabiting a colony of scarabs wrapped around a humanoid skeleton.
memorable: Known for its regenerative abilities and necrotic weapon attacks that deal additional damage.
goals: Destroy or hinder adventurers by utilizing dark magic and physical attacks.
relations: Related to other undead creatures, might encounter mummies or necromancers.
environment: Often found in tombs or necromancer lairs.
strengths: Has necrotic weapon attacks, self-regeneration, and can move through tight spaces.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to fire damage and susceptible to non-magical attacks.
attacks: Uses a Multiattack with a Ceremonial Greatsword dealing slashing and additional necrotic damage; can unleash a Vomit Swarm attack to cover enemies in scarabs.
most_powerful_ability: Vomit Swarm attack, which can deal significant area damage and cover opponents in damaging scarabs.
senses: Has darkvision of 60 ft. and possesses average passive perception.
additional_information: Regenerates 5 HP at the start of its turn if alive.
Weapon attacks deal extra necrotic damage.
Can move through openings large enough for tiny scarabs.
Does not require air, food, drink, or sleep.
test_queries: spirit inhabiting a colony of scarabs
monster that can crawl through small spaces
fearsome undead that attacks with swarms
